translation: Know that the wise who have realized the truth will instruct thee in that knowledge through long prostration, supplication, and service.
commentary: 4.34 That That? Viddhi know? by bowing by long prostration? by question by estion? Sevaya by service? will instruct will instruct? They to thee? Knowledge knowledge? the wise the wise? Tattvadarsinah those who have realized the Truth.Commentary Go to the teachers (those who are well versed in the scriptures dealing with Brahman or Brahmasrotris? and who are established in Brahman or Brahmanishthas). Prostrate
